description: A Filecoin lotus dashboard for miners

links.title: lotus Farcaster Homepage
links.tooltip: Open Lotus Farcaster homepage on GitHub

panels.description:
Status if error it means the last update was in error
Last update is the last time that lotus-farcaster has been executed on the miner
panels.title: Status on

targets.expr:
# REtourne le nombre de JOB dans l'etat running
count by (task) (lotus_miner_worker_job{miner_id="$miner_id",run_wait="0"})

# Retourne la liste de tout les jobs "Running" enrichi aves les informations deals and creation date recuperer depuis la liste des sectors
lotus_miner_worker_job{miner_id="$miner_id",run_wait="0"} * on (sector_id) group_left(deals,creation_date) (lotus_miner_sector_state{miner_id="$miner_id",state!~"(Proving|Removed)"})*1

# Retourne la liste des jobs en cours "Running" pour lesquels il n'a a pas encore des secteurs (Les premiers AP par exemple) 
lotus_miner_worker_job{run_wait="0"} unless on (sector_id) (lotus_miner_sector_state{miner_id="$miner_id",state!~"(Proving|Removed)"})*1

# Calcul do 95 centile sur 30 jours des jobs par Worker et Par task et calcul le temps restant pour chacun des jobs
lotus_miner_worker_job{miner_id="$miner_id",run_wait="0"} - on(worker_host,task) group_left()(quantile(0.95,(max_over_time(lotus_miner_worker_job{miner_id="$miner_id",worker_host!="", run_wait="0"}[30d]) > 1)) by (worker_host,task))

# Retourne la date de creation du secteur
lotus_miner_sector_event{event_type="creation"} and on(sector_id) lotus_miner_worker_job{run_wait="0"}

# Retourne tout les secteurs qui sont sur les workers mais dans un statut different de Running. On les enrichis avec les infos des workers (Assigned par exemple)
(lotus_miner_sector_state{miner_id="$miner_id", state!~"(Proving|Removed)"} * on (sector_id) group_left(job_id,run_wait,job_start_time,task,worker) lotus_miner_worker_job{miner_id="$miner_id", run_wait!="0"})*1

# Retourne les jobs qui sont sur les worker dans un etat different de Running et qui seraient absent de la liste des secteurs (pas sur que ca existe)
(lotus_miner_worker_job{miner_id="$miner_id", run_wait!="0"} unless on (sector_id) (lotus_miner_sector_state{miner_id="$miner_id", state!~"(Proving|Removed)"}))*1

# Retourne la liste des secteurs qui ne sont pas dans la liste des Jobs (Comme le WAitSeed, WaitCommit, mais aussi d'autres qui traine)
# Les label_replace servent a creer des colonnes à 0 au cas ou la premiere requete ne retourne rien
(label_replace(label_replace(label_replace(label_replace(label_replace(lotus_miner_sector_state{miner_id="$miner_id", state!~"(Proving|Removed)"},"job_id","0","",""),"run_wait","98","",""),"job_start_time","0","",""),"task","0","",""),"worker","0","","") unless on (sector_id) lotus_miner_worker_job{miner_id="$miner_id"})*1

# Retourne la date de creation pour les secteurs. Ici on filtre sur les 2 requetes principales precendente and AND et on les unis avec OR. Les requetes precendetes se terminent par *1 pour perdre le nom de la metrics et s'assurer que la transformation Merge fonctionne.
((lotus_miner_sector_event{miner_id="$miner_id", event_type="creation"})  and  on (sector_id) lotus_miner_worker_job{miner_id="$miner_id", run_wait!="0"}) or ((lotus_miner_sector_event{miner_id="$miner_id", event_type="creation"})  and  on (sector_id) (lotus_miner_sector_state{miner_id="$miner_id", state!~"(Proving|Removed)"} unless on (sector_id) lotus_miner_worker_job{miner_id="$miner_id"}))

quantile(0.5, (topk(10,lotus_miner_sector_event{miner_id="$miner_id", event_type="finalized"}) - on (sector_id) lotus_miner_sector_event{miner_id="$miner_id", event_type="packed"}) and on(sector_id) lotus_miner_sector_state{miner_id="$miner_id", state="Proving"})

quantile(0.5, (topk(100,lotus_miner_sector_event{miner_id="$miner_id", event_type="finalized"}) - on (sector_id) lotus_miner_sector_event{miner_id="$miner_id", event_type="packed"}) and on(sector_id) lotus_miner_sector_state{miner_id="$miner_id", state="Proving"})

quantile(0.5, (lotus_miner_sector_event{miner_id="$miner_id", event_type="finalized"} - on (sector_id) lotus_miner_sector_event{miner_id="$miner_id", event_type="packed"}) and on(sector_id) lotus_miner_sector_state{miner_id="$miner_id", state="Proving"})

panels.title: Average Sealing Duration (From Packed to Finalized)

targets.expr: quantile(0.5, (topk(10,lotus_miner_sector_event{miner_id="$miner_id", event_type="finalized"}) - on (sector_id) lotus_miner_sector_event{miner_id="$miner_id", event_type="packed"}) and on(sector_id) lotus_miner_sector_state{miner_id="$miner_id", state="Proving"})

quantile(0.5, (topk(100,lotus_miner_sector_event{miner_id="$miner_id", event_type="finalized"}) - on (sector_id) lotus_miner_sector_event{miner_id="$miner_id", event_type="packed"}) and on(sector_id) lotus_miner_sector_state{miner_id="$miner_id", state="Proving"})

quantile(0.5, (lotus_miner_sector_event{miner_id="$miner_id", event_type="finalized"} - on (sector_id) lotus_miner_sector_event{miner_id="$miner_id", event_type="packed"}) and on(sector_id) lotus_miner_sector_state{miner_id="$miner_id", state="Proving"})

panels.title: Average Sealing Duration (From Packed to Finalized)
